ListItem.name: LI_355371
ListItem.title: Distant skin, distant subcutaneous tissue, or distant lymph node(s)

Section.name: S_21642
Section.title: PATHOLOGIC STAGE CLASSIFICATION (pTNM, AJCC 8th Edition) (Note G)

DisplayedItem.name: DI_55784
DisplayedItem.title: Reporting of pT, pN, and (when applicable) pM categories is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

Property.name: p_rptTxt_55784_1
Property.val: Reporting of pT, pN, and (when applicable) pM categories is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

DisplayedItem.name: DI_48874
DisplayedItem.title: If clinical tumor size is unavailable, gross or microscopic tumor measurement should be used for determining the T category.

ListItem.name: LI_327647
ListItem.title: pT not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

ListItem.name: LI_21649
ListItem.title: pT0: No evidence of primary tumor

ListItem.name: LI_21651
ListItem.title: pT1: Maximum clinical tumor diameter less than or equal to 2 cm

ListItem.name: LI_21652
ListItem.title: pT2: Maximum clinical tumor diameter greater than 2 but less than or equal to 5 cm

ListItem.name: LI_21653
ListItem.title: pT3: Maximum clinical tumor diameter greater than 5 cm

ListItem.name: LI_21654
ListItem.title: pT4: Primary tumor invades bone, muscle, fascia, or cartilage

ListItem.name: LI_327649
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (no nodes submitted or found)

ListItem.name: LI_327650
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

ListItem.name: LI_42107
ListItem.title: pN0: No regional lymph node metastasis detected on pathological evaluation

DisplayedItem.name: DI_35974
DisplayedItem.title: pN1: Metastasis in regional lymph node(s)

ListItem.name: LI_43395
ListItem.title: pN1a(sn): Clinically occult regional lymph node metastasis identified only by sentinel lymph node biopsy

ListItem.name: LI_56399
ListItem.title: pN1a: Clinically occult regional lymph node metastasis following lymph node dissection

DisplayedItem.name: DI_55011
DisplayedItem.title: # The pN1b, subcategory is dependent on clinical information that may be unavailable to the pathologist. If this information is not available, the parent category (pN1) should be selected.

ListItem.name: LI_57610
ListItem.title: pN1b: Clinically and/or radiologically detected regional lymph node metastasis#

ListItem.name: LI_41795
ListItem.title: pN2: In transit metastasis (discontinuous from primary tumor; located between primary tumor and draining regional nodal basin, or distal to the primary tumor) without lymph node metastasis

ListItem.name: LI_53468
ListItem.title: pN3: In transit metastasis (discontinuous from primary tumor; located between primary tumor and draining regional nodal basin, or distal to the primary tumor) with lymph node metastasis

ListItem.name: LI_21679
ListItem.title: ?Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)

Property.name: p_rptTxt_21679_1
Property.val: Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)

ListItem.name: LI_53045
ListItem.title: pM1a: Metastasis to distant skin, distant subcutaneous tissue, or distant lymph node(s), microscopically confirmed

ListItem.name: LI_51030
ListItem.title: pM1b: Metastasis to lung, microscopically confirmed

ListItem.name: LI_42391
ListItem.title: pM1c: Metastasis to all other distant sites, microscopically confirmed
